Hkrang laika (form) hpe tang shawn ai shaloi, ningra ai lam lama ma nga ai: %s
Mahtai nkau mi hta jep shagrin ai lam hte seng nna ningra ai lam ni nga ai
Lamang nhtan ni hpe jep shagrin lu na matu, Tella gaw na a nga shara hpe matsing bang da na ra nhtawm, na a lamu ga nga shara madun masat ai ladat (GPS) hpe lang na hkang lu ra nga ai.
Hkrang laika ni (form) hpe htawt bang nga ai
Hkrang laika ni a jahpan hpe prat madang bung hkra galaw ai (update) ai shaloi, ningra ai lam nga ai. Chyeju hte kalang bai chyam yu u
Ndai hkrang laika (form) hpe madun ai shaloi ningra ai lam nga ai. Chyeju hte kalang bai chyam yu u
Hkrang laika(Form) hpe matsing bang da u
Hkrang laika(Form) hpe matsing bang da u
Hkrang laika(Form) hpe matsing bang da u

Ndai hkrang laika hpe na a jak kata kaw na nang kaja wa sha shaprai kau mayu ai kun? Tang shawn da ngut sai re majaw, shiga lamang gaw na a wuhpung wuhpawng a madung kompyuta jak hta naw ngam nga na re ai lam hpe matsing da u.
Ndai hkrang laika (form) hpe nang kaja wa sha shaprai kau mayu ai kun?
Ndai hkrang laika hpe shaprai kau sai
Tella hpe nye a jak kaw rawng ai tsun shaga ga hte maren galaw tawn u
Shawng e nga chyalu re ai
Ndai hkrang laika hpe tang shawn na matu, nang hta ahkang n nga ai. Ndai lam gaw shut ai lam langai re ngu nna nang myit la ai rai yang, chyeju hte na a wuhpung wuhpawng hpe matut mahkai yu u
Lamang nhtan hpe htawt bang la ai shaloi, ningra ai lam nga ai. Chyeju hte kalang bai chyam yu u
Nang hku nna intanet hte rai n matut da shi ai. Matut mahkai ngut ai shaloi kalang bai chyam yu u
Hkrang laika hte seng ai nkau mi hpe, shing n rai, yawng hpe n shagun sa ai. Dai hpe nang kaja wa sha raw di tawn kau mayu ai kun?
Lamang nhtan ni hpe shapraw la ai shaloi, ningra ai lam nga ai. Chyeju hte kalang bai chyam yu u
Lamang nhtan ni hpe shapraw la na matu, Tella gaw jak kata na lamang mazing gawk (storage) hta ka na ahkang ra nga ai.
Lamang nhtan ni hpe shaprai kau ai shaloi, ningra ai lam lama ma nga ai. Chyeju hte kalang bai chyam yu u.
Lamang nhtan (file) hpe shaprai na kun?
The selected file will be permanently deleted from your gallery.
Jak kata na sumla madun gawk (gallery) hta matsing bang da na kun?
Ndai gaw, na a lamang nhtan hpe Tella shinggan e nga ai na jak a sumla madun gawk (gallery) hte, kaga bungli lamang ni hta shang yu mai hkra galaw ya nga ai.
Ning-ip ga makoi hte hpaw la ai nga ai
Lamang nhtan ni hpe htawt la na matu sumla madun gawk hpaw ai shaloi, ningra ai lam lama ma nga ai. Chyeju hte kalang bai chyam yu u
Lamang nhtan(file) hpe matsing bang ai shaloi, ningra ai lam lama ma nga ai. Chyeju hte kalang bai chyam yu u
Lamang nhtan hpe shakap ai shaloi, ningra ai lam lama ma nga ai. Chyeju hte kalang bai chyam yu u
Hkrang laika hpe htawt la ai shaloi, ningra ai lama ma nga ai. Chyeju hte kalang bai chyam yu u
Hkrang laika (form) hpe htawt la ai shaloi ningra ai lam langai ngai nga ai: %s
Hkrang laika hpe tam n mu ai. Dai hpe na a wuhpung wuhpawng a madung kompyuta jak kaw na shaprai kau ya ai mai byin ai
Na a laika nhprang hpe shamat kau na ra ai
MATSING BANG DA NNA PRU U

Ndai gaw hkap la mai ai laksan hkri-dun hkringdat (URL) langai n re ai.
Ningnan dik htum kaw nna dingsa dik htum de
Dingsa dik htum kaw nna ningnan dik htum de
Kompyuta hta lang ai mying (Username), shing n rai, ga makoi (password) shut ai.
Madung kompyuta jak a laksan hkri-dun hkringdat (URL) n jaw ai.
Madung kompyuta jak (server) hte matut mahkai lu hkra shakut ai shaloi, ningra ai lam langai ngai nga ai.
Nang gaw intanet hte n matut mahkai da ai. Matut mahkai ngut ai shaloi kalang bai chyam yu u.
Select a custom icon and name to better hide Tella on your device. Note that the Tella icon will remain visible from the Android settings.
Jak rai kata hta e matsing bang da u
Na a jak rai hte nga shara hte seng ai shiga lamai lamang ni hpe mahkawng ai let, na a shiga lamang nhtan ni hpe masat shagrin la lu ai.
Loi ai shiga lamang mahkawng ai lam

Hkrang laika ni hpe hkap la lu nna shiga lamang ni hpe tang shawn lu na matu, nang gaw shawng nnan htap htuk ai madung kompyuta jak langai ngai hte matut mahkai da ra ai. Madung kompyuta jak shiga lami lamang ni a matu, na a wuhpung wuhpawng hpe san yu nna, ndai kaw madung kompyuta jak hpe lajang shanjin u.
Madun na matu tang shawn da ai hkrang laika ni n nga ai.
Madun na matu hkrang laika ni n nga ai. Nang matut mahkai da ai madung kompyuta ni hta hkrang laika ni lu la mai ai rai yang, jep yu na matu n-gun ban ai lam (Refresh) hkalap hpe ahtawk hkra dat u.
Kaga mying hte masat kumla langai ngai hpe lata san u
There are no files to show. Tap the + button to import files.
Nang hku nna intanet hte rai n matut da shi ai. Matut mahkai ngut ai shaloi kalang bai chyam yu u
Hten za mat ai shiga lami laman ni hpe garan u

Hten za mat ai shiga lami laman htawn ai lam ni gaw, Tella hpe grau kaja wa hkra karum ya nga ai. Dai ni hpe shi hte shi shagun sa ya nna, jak rai a kasi kamang hte Android hkrang kasi zawn re ai shiga lamang ni mung lawm nga ai.
Kaga\"%s\" langai hpe jat bang na kun?
\"%s\" hta ga san ni yawng hpe nang kalang bai htai mai nga ai.
Nang hku nna \"%s\" hta e ga san ni yawng hpe htai lu na ndai.
Lamang nhtan(file) hpe lata san u
Shara masa lam hpe matsing bang da u
Matsing bang da ai shara masa
Tup hkrak teng ai lam: %1$s m
Shakap da ai lamang nhtan hpe lamang bang nga ai shaloi, ningra ai lam langai ngai nga ai. Chyeju hte kalang bai chyam yu u
Nga shara matsing da na matu, shara ra hta nari sekkan 3 ahtawk hkra dat u.
Jep shagrin ai lam hte seng ai shiga lami lamang ni
Jep shagrin ai lam hte seng ai shiga lami lamang ni
Gram jahtuk da ai lamang nhtan
Kompyuta jak rai hte seng ai hkingrai

Nga shara hpe karum madi shadaw ya ai wa
Nga shara hte seng ai lawan shadang
Cell phone hte seng ai shiga lami lamang
Ginra masa hta hkan ai ginlam
Mahtai langai hpe lata san la u
Lata san ai lam hpe shaw jasan kau u
Na a lata masat sen hpe htu u
Ndai kaw lata masat sen hpe ka u
Lata masat sen hpe shaw jasan kau u
Lata masat sen hpe matsing da ai lam hta ningra ai lam langai ngai nga ai. Chyeju hte kalang bai chyam yu u
Hkrak sai. Chyeju hte dingngam galaw u.
Madung kompyuta jak hta jat bang u
Madung kompyuta jak masat ai lam ni hpe shaprai kau u
Kalang bai shagun na matu jep shagrin u
Tang shawn ngut sai hkrang laika (form)
Tang shawn ngut sai hkrang laika (form)
Hkrang laika (form) hpe lamang bang ai lam hta shut shai ai lam langai ngai nga taw ai. Chyeju hte kalang bai chyam yu u
Hkrang laika (form) hpe sa na matu, na a intanet matut mahkai ai lam n-gun grai yawm nga ai. Chye ju hte kalang bai chyam yu u
Ning-ip ga makoi hte la da ai lamang nhtan(file)
Hkrang laika (form) ni hte madung kompyuta jak (server) ni yawng hpe shaprai kau ngut sai

Hkrang laika ni hpe hkap la na hte, shiga lamang ni hpe tang shawn na matu, shawng nnan, nang hku nna madung kompyuta jak langai hte matut mahkai da ra ai. Madung kompyuta jak shiga lami lamang ni hpe na a wuhpung wuhpawng hpe san la nna, madung kompyuta jak hpe lajang shajin u.

Nang hku nna na a dinghkrai hkrang laika hpe galaw shalat la mayu ai rai yang, anhte hpe matut mahkai u shing n rai, jai lang uYawng mai lang ai shiga lamang hkinghku rai (Open Data Kit -ODK) hta mahta nna galaw lajang ya ai (service) langai ngai
Lama wa, nang intanet hte n matut da ai rai yang, hkrang laika ni hpe nang hku nna naw mai ka jahpring mai nga ai. Nang online lang dat ai hte rau, dai shiga lamang ni hpe tang shawn mat na re.
Shakap da ai lamang nhtan ni grai kaba ai majaw, na a hkrang laika tang shawn ai lam hpe n mai galaw ai. Chye ju hte, grau kaji ai lamang nhtan ni hpe shakap u
Nang ya pru ai rai yang, tang shawn ai lam hpe jahkring tawn ra na re ai rai ti mung, ngam nga ai lamang nhtan ni hpe gaw nang hku nna hpang de tang shawn mai nga ai.
Jaw masat rai n galaw da shi ai lamang ni hpe hpang daw de shagun na matu matsing bang da na re.
Hpang daw de tang shawn ai lam a matu matsing bang da ai hkrang laika (form)
Ntsa daw de na bai raw kau u
Ntsa daw de matut shakap u

Jep shagrin ai lai ladat hpe HPAW da timung, Mungkan nga shara madun masat ai ladat (GPS) hpe PAT nga ai. Na a madi madun ai nga shara hpe matsing bang na matu Mungkan nga shara madun masat ya ai ladat (GPS) hpe HPAW u.
Lamu ga shara madun masat ya ai ladat (GPS) hpe hpaw u
Hkrang laika (form) ni a jahpan hpe prat madang bung hkra lamang bang ya ai lam...
Prat madang bung hkra lamang bang ai lam dawm kau ngut sai
Prat madang bung hkra lamang bang ai lam galaw ngut sai
Jep shagrin ai shiga lami lamang ni hpe shalawm mayu ai kun?

Lata san da ai lamang nhtan langai, shing n rai, lamang nhtan nkau mi hta jak rai, hkridun hte lamu ga shara madun ai shiga lami lamang ni zawn re ai shiga lamang jep shagrin ai lam ni lawm nga ai. Ndai gaw nang hpe hkrit tsang hpa n shabyin ai rai yang chyu sha, garan u.
Lamang nhtan (file) ni + jep shagrin ai lam shiga lami lamang hpe garan u
Lamang nhtan (file) ni hpe sha garan u
Sin-yu kata hkridun (Wi-Fi) shiga lami lamang

Na a lamang nhtan hpe jep shagrin lu na matu, Tella gaw shiga lami lamang ni hpe matsing bang nga ai. Dai lam gaw nari minit loi mi na chye nga ai. Grau hkrak ai mahtai kaja hpe lu la na matu, na jak a lamu ningmu ginra hpe kapat da ai lam n nga hkra lajang da u.
Jep shagrin ai lam hte seng ai Karum ningtum
Jep shagrin ai lam hte seng ai Karum ningtum
Tella lam matsun laika(directory)hta lamang nhtan(file) nga ai shara.
Lamang nhtan hpe garan ginhka na matu laksan htihkum langai.
Jak rai ntsa lamang nhtan (file) hpe hpang jahtum gram jahtuk da ai nhtoi hte aten.
Jak galaw shapraw ai wa a mying.
Jak a tup hkrak re ai hkrang kasi.
Android jak hpe garan ginhka ya ai laksan htihkum.
Jak a tup hkrak re ai pat man.
Jak rai a tatut akyu jashawn ai ladat hte seng ai masat da ai shaga ga.
Jak rai nga ai lamu ga nga shara (geographic region).
Jak hpe intanet hte matut mahkai da ai rai yang rai, shing n rai intanet hte n matut mahkai da ai rai yang rai.
Jak rai gaw intanet hte matut mahkai da ai rai yang, sin-yu kata hkridun (Wi-Fi) de, shing n rai, phone selula hkridun de hkrak tup masat ya u.
Jak a sin-yu n lang ai hkridun(Wi-Fi ) matut mahkai hkingrai a matu lak san garan ginhka ya ai kumla langai.
Jak a intanet matut mahkai ai lam hpe garan ginhka ya ai laksan hkring dat langai.
Jak langai a intanet matut mahkai ai lam hte seng nna ndai laman hte grau ni ai aten hta garan ginhka ya ai kumla langai.

Jak a tup hkrak re ai nga shara ngu ai hta, ginding hkret bat(latitude) hte ginding hkret dung (longitude) htihkum ni, panglai hpungtsaw shadawn jitna mita ni, shadawn jitna mita ni hku nna tup hkrak jaw ai shadawn shadang hte, shadawn yu ai aten ni yawng lawm nga ai.

Nga shara hpe gara hku daw dan masat ya na. \"Gumhpawn tawn ai (fused)\" ngu ai gaw mungkan shara madun masat ya ai ladat (GPS) hte hkridun matut mahkai ai lam ni zawn re ai ladat kaja ni hpe kayau kaya jai lang nga ai lam ngu ai lachyum rawng nga ai.
Jak rai gaw nari sekkan mi hta shadawn jitna mita hku nna hkawm sa lu ai lawan shadang.
Jak hte matut mahkai da ai phone langchyi (Tower)ni yawng hte seng nna garan ginghka da ai htihkum ni.
Jak a makau mayang e nga ai sin-yu kata hkridun(Wi-Fi) ni yawng a mying.
Hkrang laika nkau mi hpe madang shatsaw lamang bang ngut sai. Hpang jahtum na kasi kamang(version) hpe lu la hkra, hkrang laika ni a makau na madang shatsaw lamang hkalap (button) hpe ahtawk dat u.
Kaning re ai madung compyuta jak hpang de lamang nhtan ni hpe nang shagun jaw mayu ai kun?
Yawng mai lang ai shiga lamang hkinghku rai (Open Data Kit -ODK)
Nang matut mahkai mayu ai madung kompyuta jak hpan hpe lata san la u. Nang hkrak n chye ai rai yang, na a wuhpung wuhpawng hpe sa u.
Lamang shagun ai lam hpe matsun madun u
%1$d shani ni, nari hkying hkum ni %2$d (%3$s) ngam ai
Nari hkying hkum ni %1$d Nari minit %2$d (%3$s) ngam ai
Higher resolution means that the video will be of higher quality but the file size will also be larger.
Madang tsaw ai(dingdung yawn sumla san ningja 1080)
Pran wan madang(dingdung yawn sula san ningja 720)
Madang nem ai (dingdung yawn sumla san ningja 480)

Tell gaw na a dat sumla ni, sumla hkrung ni, shing n rai, nsen rim da ai lam ni hpe Tella kata kaw matsing rim bang ngut jang, shing n rai, htawt la ngut jang, dai ni yawng hpe madung kompyuta de shagun jaw ya ai.
Shi hte shi shaprai kau ai lam
Lamang nhtan ni hpe gara madung kompyuta jak de nang hku nna shi hte shi lamang shagun ai lam galaw mayu ai kun?
Madung kompyuta jak (server) hpe nang lata san la ra na re.
Kaga lata la na lam ni
Hkying sekkan mi hta Shadawn jitna mita mi %f
Matsing ningting ai lam hte Makawp maga ai lam galaw u
Nang hku nna Tella hpe gara hku sumsaw la da mayu ai rai?
Shim dik htum lata la ai lam
Ram daw shim lam nga ai
Yawm dik htum shim lam hpe lata la ai lam
Chyahkring chyahkra hkring sa ai lam hpe sumsaw la u
Sumla dem jak (Kemra) nsen n shapru ai lai ladat(mode)
Turn off the camera shutter sound to draw less attention when taking photos.
Shows a sliding button on the homescreen to quickly exit Tella in emergency situations.
Na a wuhpung wuhpawng de shiga lamang ni mahkawng nna, shagun sa na matu madung kompyuta jak ni hte matut mahkai u
Madung compyuta jak (server) de shi hte shi lamang shagun jaw u

( Dat sumla ni, sumla hkrung ni, shing n rai, nsen rim lamang nhtan ni) zawn re lamang ni hpe mahkawng da ngut ai jang, shing n rai, dai ni hpe Tella kata de htawt la ngut jang, na a lamang nhtan ni hpe na a shiga lami lamang htawn ai lam madung kompyuta jak de shagun jaw u.
Hkalap hpe hpaw da ai rai jang, lamang shagun jaw ai lam ngut ai hte Tella gaw shagun jaw ai lamang nhtan (file) ni hpe shi hte shi shaprai kau na re.
Shi hte shi lamang shagun na matu madung kompyuta(server)
SHIGA LAMI LAMANG HTAWN AI LAM NI
Shi hte shi lamang shagun jaw ai madung kompyuta jak hpe lata san la u
Shi hte shi lamang shagun jaw ai lam hpe mai hkra hpaw da na kun?

Na a dat sumla ni, sumla hkrung ni hte nsen rim da ai lamang nhtan ni hpe matsing rim bang da ngut ai hte rau, shi hte shi lamang shagun jaw ya na rai nna, nang hku nna Tella kata de htawt la ai shaloi e, kaning re ai lamang nhtan hpe rai ti mung, shi hte shi shagun jaw ya na re.
Shi hte shi lamang shagun jaw ai lam hpe n mai hkra pat da na kun?
Na a lamang nhtan (file) ni hpe madung kompyuta jak (server) ntsa de shi hte shi shagun jaw ai lam hpe galaw shana n re.
Shi hte shi shaprai kau ai lam hpe n mai lang hkra pat da na kun?
Lamang shagun ai lam(upload) ngut hte rau, na a lamang nhtan (file) ni hpe shi hte shi shaprai kau sana n re.
%1$s Madung kompyuta (server) hpe shaprai kau na kun?
Ra kadawn ai tengman lam sakse madun ai lam
Decide how long it takes for Tella to lock
Tella kata bang da ai lamang nhtan ni yawng hpe shaprai kau u.
Laika nhprang hte tang shawn da ai hkrang laika ni yawng hpe shaprai kau u.
Madung kompyuta ni hte na a matut mahkai ai lam ni hte, shanhte hte seng ai hkrang laika ni yawng hpe shaprai kau u.

Bungli lamang hte dai hta rawng ai shiga lamang ni yawng hpe shaprai kau u. \"Ndai bungli lamang hpe nang shaw kau mayu nni?\" ngu nna, nang hpe san wa na ra ai. Nang hkap la shagrin ai lam n nga jang, Tella hpe mung shaprai kau ai lam nga na n re.
Jep joi ai lam (censorship) hpe koi yen u

Na a buga ginra hta Tella hpe pat shingdang na matu shakut shaja ai lam ni hpe dang kau u. Dai hpe hpaw tawn ai majaw, madung kompyuta ni hpang de shiga lamang sa ai shaloi grau lanyan shangun chye ai hpe matsing da u.
Your app is currently camouflaged with a Calculator app
MAGAP MAKOI AI LAM LADAT HPE GALAI KAU U
MAGAP MAKOI AI LAM HPE SHAW KAU U
Tella hpe makoi madap na matu, nang ra sharawng ai ladat kaja hpe lata san u
Makoi magap ai lam hpe masat lajang u
There are two camouflage options available. The first one is quicker but less secure; the second one is less convenient but more secure.
MYING HTE LAMANG MASAT KUMLA HPE GALAI KAU U
Tella gaw pat ma ntsa e kaga bungli lamang mying hte lamang masat kumla (icon) hku nna dan pru wa na ra ai
Bungli lamang (app) ajet langai a hpang e makoi da u
Shim dik htum lata la ai lam: Tatut akyu jashawn nga ai bungli lamang a hpang e, Tella hpe ning-ip makoi magap da u
MYING HTE LAMANG MASAT KUMLA HPE GALAI KAU U
Less secure: Tella will appear on the home screen with a different app name and icon. Tapping on the new icon opens the actual Tella.
More secure: Camouflage Tella behind an actual functioning calculator app. Input your PIN on the calculator to unlock Tella.
The Calculator camouflage is only possible if you use a PIN lock. Change lock here
Na a sumsaw ladat hpe nang galai kau ai rai yang, makoi magap ai lam n mai galaw sai
Tinang hkrai dem la mai ai Sumla dem jak( Kemra )
Lamu marang masa Tsawm ai lam
Nsen rim ai lam hpe mying bai shamying u
Nsen rim ai lam hpe na a Tella lamang nhtan hta e matsing bang da sai
Tella kaw na hkap tau la ga ai
Take photos and videos directly in Tella. These files are automatically encrypted and saved in Tella, and will not be visible from your phone’s regular gallery.
Record interviews or any sound around you with Tella’s voice recorder. The audio files are automatically encrypted and saved in Tella’s hidden folder.
Ning-ip ga makoi hte la da ai lamang nhtan ni hte laika nhtan ni
Securely store and organize all your files. As long as Tella is locked, your files and folders will remain inaccessible to someone seizing or searching the device.
Na a sumsaw hpe galaw lajang ngut sai! Nang hku nna dai hpe masat ai lam hta kam ai ten hta e galai ai.
You can go to Tella now, or continue customizing Tella to set up advanced settings.
Madang tsaw masat ai lam ni (settings)
Nang mahkawng zing da ai shiga lami lamang (data) hpe garan u
If you work with an organization, connect to the organization’s server to send files and data with them. Your organization should provide you with the server details.
Madung kompyuta hte matut mahkai u
Madung kompyuta langai ngai de n matut mahkai ai sha dingngam sa u
To make it harder to find on your device, you can hide Tella by changing the way it looks on your homescreen.
Tella remains visible on the home screen
Madang tsaw jahtuk la ai lam ngut sai!
You can always continue changing your preferences in Settings.
Madung kompyuta (server) hte matut mahkai da sai

Your camouflage is set up! You can change it anytime in Settings.
Dinghkrai masat htihkum(PIN) sumsaw langai hpe nang lang ai rai yang chyu sha, Sawn sang jak makoi magap ai lam hpe galaw lu na rai nga ai.
Sawn sang jak hpe lata san la u

Akyu jashawn jai lang nga ai Sawn sang jak bungli lamang a hpang e, Tella hpe ning-ip makoi da na re. Sawn sang jak kaw, na a dinghkrai masat htihkum(PIN) a hpang \"=\" hte hkan nna shang let Tella hpe hpaw u
Ndai laman na lamang nhtan (file) ni
Show previews of and a shortcut to your recent files on Tella’s homescreen.
Show shortcuts to your favorite forms on Tella’s homescreen.
Makoi madap ai lam hpe hpaw na matu Tella kaw na pru na kun?
Tella hpe bai hpaw na matu, na a bungli lamang ni kaw na %s bungli lamang masat kumla hpe tam u.

Tella hpe bai hpaw na matu, na a bungli lamang (apps) ni kaw na Sawn sang jak bungli lamang masat kumla (icon) hpe tam u. Sawn sang jak (Calculator) kaw, na a dinghkrai masat htihkum (PIN) a hpang \"=\" hte hkan nna shang let Tella hpe hpaw u.

Hpang de, madung kompyuta (server) ni bai jat bang ai rai yang, dai hpe matsing lu na matu, na a madung kompyuta hpe amying langai jaw da u. Dai gaw, wuhpung langai a mying, bungli masing hte seng ai mying zawn re ai ni mai byin nga ai.
Lamang htawt la ai lam hte ning-ip ga makoi la da ai lam
Na a nsen rim da ai lamang nhtan hpe matsing bang da na kun?
Na a nsen rim ai lam hpe n matsing bang da ai. Rai n pru yang, dai hpe nang matsing bang da mayu ai kun?
Nsen rim da ai lamang nhtan ni
Ning-ip ga makoi hte la da ai ladat(encryption) hpe dawm kau nna, lamang nhtan (file) hpe shaprai kau na kun?
Nang dawm kau ai rai yang, na a lamang nhtan (file) hpe shamat kau na re
NING-IP GA MAKOI HTE LA DA AI LADAT(ENCRYPTION) HPE BAI HPANG U
LAMANG NHTAN (FILE) HPE SHAPRAI KAU U
Change lock method and remove camouflage?

Nang ya lang ai Sawnsang jak (Calculator) makoi magap ai lam gaw, dinghkrai masat htihkum (PIN) sumsaw hte sha lang mai ai. Na a sumsaw la ai ladat hpe nang galai kau ai rai yang, Tella hpe tut nawng makoi magap da na n rai sai raitim, na a phone pat man ntsa hta gaw mu nga ai.
MAGAP MAKOI AI LAM HPE SHAW KAU U
Na a makoi magap ai ladat hpe galai na matu, na a ga makoi hpe dip bang u

The next version of Tella (to be released on 15 July 2024) will include major technical improvements. These changes carry a small risk that some files are lost when updating to the new version.
If you store sensitive files in Tella, we advise you to copy them to a safe place outside of Tella before the update.
Tap ‘Learn More’ below for more information on the upcoming changes and guidance on how to export all files from Tella.

You can opt out anytime by going to Settings.
For more information on how we collect data, visit this page.
• We use DivviUp, a privacy-respecting system for analytics. • We collect as little data as possible. • All data is anonymous and can never be linked to you.
Each study collects data about specific questions. Here’s a sample:
🔓 Opened Tella 4 times a week 💾 32 files stored in Tella 📖 Spanish language selected ⚡ 1 server connected 😎 Calculator camouflage enabled
Share your data to improve Tella
By joining this study, you would help us understand which features are important to you and how you use the app.
• We will not access any of the files that you store in Tella or share with your organization. • We will never share your data or sell it to anyone.

Help us understand how you use Tella. All data is anonymous and can never be linked to you.
